According to statistics compiled by HomeAdvisors.com, the U.S. national average price for central air installation in 2013 ranges from $2,000 (basic) to over $10,000 (top quality). HomeAdvisors.com based these statistics off actual project costs reported by members who contributed 7,325 cost profiles.
